Author: stupidibidiby
Text: Hey! Great to hear that you’re putting your health first, that’s a major step. But this sub isn’t the right place to post this. r/1500isplenty and r/xxfitness have tons of great resources, and they’re both supportive communities for sustainable lifestyle changes. Rooting for you

Author: Lunaseki
Text: Eating disorder sites are not for taking control of your life, whether we believe it or not. Eating disorders run our brains, there is no actual control or healthy mentality involved. If you want to lose weight please seek out actual weight loss subs.
